## Summary
A clear, short description of the mismatch (what you expected vs. what you saw).

## Environment
- OpenSpoolMan version / commit:
- Deployment: ☐ Docker ☐ venv ☐ Helm/cluster ☐ Other
- Browser (name/version):
- `DISABLE_MISMATCH_WARNING` set?: ☐ Yes ☐ No

## Data to attach
- `logs/filament_mismatch.json` (attach file or paste content; includes the color difference when relevant)
-  screenshot of the mismatch message in the UI

## Additional context
Anything else that could help (config snippets, AMS/SpoolMan notes, etc.).
